page.title: 03CHERRY BURTON-2
page.content: The Village Hall is the only hall large enough to house badminton,carpet bowls,short and table tennis.It is also the venue for a self-supporting playgroup,taking an average of 20 children a morning aged 3 to 5,and a fortnightly baby clinic.The hall can also be hired out for birthday parties; by the Parish Council for drama productions (well supported for children's plays but not so for adult shows);by the youth club,and other organisations. Competition as a venue has come from a residential home for male psychiatrics, Cedar Grange, who offer a warm dining room for meetings free of charge;the over_60's Tuesday Club has taken advantage, as has the Wine and Beer Circle.
